duck: Shimla - Shimla, formerly known as Simla, is the capital city of the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh, located in northern India.
similarity definition: the quality or state of being similar.

wiki.text:
Specific definitions

Different fields provide differing definitions of similarity:

In mathematics
* Similarity (geometry), a shape-preserving transformation
* Matrix similarity, a relation between matrices

In computer science
* string metric, aka string similarity
* semantic similarity in computational linguistics

In other fields
* In engineering, Similitude (model) describe the geometric, kinematic and
  dynamic 'likeness' of two (or more) systems.
* In psychology, similarity (psychology)
* In music, musical similarity
* In chemistry, chemical similarity

See also
* Same (disambiguation)
* Difference (disambiguation)
* Equality (mathematics)
* Identity (philosophy)
wiki.title: Similarity
